directions:
Heat oil to 360°F. Add sage leaves in batcges. Stir when bubbles die down and pull them out with a slotted spoon. (About 30 sec.) put on baking sheet. Dry and sprinkle with salt.

Crumble Sage into salsa.

html.directions:
Heat oil to 360°F. Add sage leaves in batcges. Stir when bubbles die down and pull them out with a slotted spoon. (About 30 sec.) put on baking sheet. Dry and sprinkle with salt.

Crumble Sage into salsa.
html.ingredients:
Basic Salsa Verde

24 sage leaves

3 cups neutral-tasting oil for frying

name: Fried Sage Salsa Verde
